question: Can you identify a professional weakness or area for improvement that you’ve worked on? How have you addressed it?
What is your strength or superpower, and how do you leverage your strengths to contribute to your team or organization’s goals?
Describe a situation where you received constructive criticism. How did you respond, and what changes did you make based on the feedback?
Describe a time when you handled a difficult customer or client. What was the issue, and how did you resolve it?
What unique qualities or skills do you bring to this role that you believe set you apart from other candidates?
Tell me about a time when you faced a setback or failure at work. How did you handle it, and what did you learn from the experience?
Describe an instance where you took on a challenging task or role despite having some doubts about your abilities. How did you overcome your reservations and succeed?
Can you provide an example of how you’ve maintained professionalism during a stressful or high-pressure situation? What strategies did you use to stay composed and effective?
Can you provide an example of how you’ve helped someone who was having difficulty with a task or project? How did you offer assistance, and what was the outcome?
Tell me about a situation where you identified a potential issue or risk before it became a problem. How did you recognize it, and what actions did you take to address it?
Describe a time when you had to make a difficult decision that tested your principles or ethics. How did you navigate the situation, and what did you learn from it?
Tell me about a time when you were entrusted with a sensitive or confidential task. How did you handle the responsibility, and what measures did you take to maintain trust?
Tell me about your proudest professional accomplishment.
Give me an example of a time you faced a conflict while working on a team. How did you handle that?
Tell me about a time when you had to adjust to a colleague’s or team’s working style in order to complete a project or achieve your objectives.
Tell me about a time you used your analytical skills to solve a complex problem in a creative way.
Can you describe a time when a colleague or teammate made a mistake, and you discovered it? How did you handle that?
Tell me about a time you had to take on a leadership role within a team or work group.
Tell me about a time when you received feedback that was less than positive.
Tell me about a time when you successfully explained a technical problem to someone who didn’t have a tech background.
